data.title: Morris and Associates
data.meta_site_name: Morris and Associates | Just another WordPress site
data.text:
Morris & Associates have looked after my finances for many years. They have always been efficient, patient and absolutely trustworthy. I could not have wished for more.

I’ve been with Morris & Associates throughout my career and it’s good to know the no nonsense, sensitive and calm handling of all my affairs has continued unchanged through all that time.

I have been a client of Morris & Associates since 1978. I have always found them to be extremely efficient and helpful, carrying out accounting tasks on tax matters where I needed assistance, and providing excellent advice on VAT matters as well. They are extremely punctual. I have always felt I could rely on Morris and Associates for perfect advice, guidance and discretion.

I’ve been with Morris & Associates for more years than I care to remember! I always know that I’ll get sound advice…prompt service and a lovely cup of coffee!

Morris and Associates have acted as my accountants for nearly three decades now, from my early years as a professional concert pianist. Paul Morris has taken over seamlessly from his predecessor and my loyalty across these many years should speak for itself as a recommendation of my trust in the firm’s integrity and judgement.

I have been using Paul Morris for many years for my end of year accounts and more recently my VAT return. He is very professional and we have a good working relationship. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend him to anyone else.

I would absolutely recommend Paul Morris at Morris & Associates; I’ve been a client for a number of years and the service has been exceptional: forensic attention to detail, extremely trustworthy and totally in tune with the way TV & Film accounting works.

Morris & Associates have represented me for many years now in all aspects of my financial affairs, offering constructive and helpful advice whilst using language I can actually understand, a first class service which I would have no hesitation in recommending to others

I’ve been a client of Morris & Associates for more years than I care to remember. Paul Morris is my accountant and I don’t know what I would do without his services, always so professional and patient.

I’ve had Morris & Associates as my accountants since I first started acting. From those confusing days of learning about keeping receipts, having enough put by for tax, they have always been my only guiding light. Ever-helpful, ever-vigilant, always contactable. I cannot recommend them highly enough to anyone in my business or any other.

I have been with Morris & Associates ever since I began my career as a stage director, and can recommend them without reservation.

Morris & Associates are clear, supportive and understanding of the ebb and flow of the tv and film business. Paul has been been unfailing in his efficiency, clarity and good humour.

George Repanelis is one of those exceptional yet rare professionals whose meticulous care and dedication to serve the client and their individual needs sets a new standard of excellence. His passion for his field, integrity and expertise is second to none, and I cannot recommend him or Morris and Associates highly enough.

Morris & Associates have taken care of my accounts for over 20 years. In that time I have found them to be utterly professional, honest, and reliable. They understand completely the demands of a self employed actor. Their support, knowledge and friendship have proved invaluable.

Morris & Associates have been my accountants for almost all of my professional career, and have consistently proved to be both solid and dependable. Beyond that, the advice and guidance offered by George Repanelis in more recent years has exceeded my expectations – and all with a friendly and approachable manner.
